EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.11-17-2016
EmailTemplate.subject: 250K Containers, PCF on Azure, and Surviving as a Digital Industry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NOVEMBER 17, 2016 <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/250k-containers-in-production-a-real-test-for-the-real-world]]> 250k Containers in Production: A Real Test for the Real World This new performance benchmark proves Cloud Foundry to be among the most scalable platforms available. Read More <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/250k-containers-in-production-a-real-test-for-the-real-world]]> <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/pivotal-ceo-rob-mee-on-digital-industry-transformation-2016-11]]> Why You Need to Change Your Culture to Survive as a Digital Industry Pivotal CEO Rob Mee is featured in this story on Business Insider. Read his explanation of the whys and hows of the digital industry. Check it Out <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/pivotal-ceo-rob-mee-on-digital-industry-transformation-2016-11]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/pivotal-cloud-foundry-goes-global-with-microsoft-azure]]> Pivotal Cloud Foundry Goes Global with Microsoft Azure Enterprises, rejoice! Pivotal and Microsoft now offer Cloud Foundry across Azure datacenters. Check it Out <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/pivotal-cloud-foundry-goes-global-with-microsoft-azure]]> <[[https://youtu.be/YX2XR73LnRY]]> 3X with Kent Beck Extreme Programming pioneer Kent Beck stopped by our New York office to talk about the 3X model. Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/YX2XR73LnRY]]> <[[https://soundcloud.com/pivotal-life/pivotal-life-podcast-episode-1-our-unique-morning-culture-at-pivotal-labs]]> Our Unique Morning Culture In the first episode of Pivotal Life, Parker and Caroline share how we begin the first 40 minutes of our days at Labs. Listen to the Episode <[[https://soundcloud.com/pivotal-life/pivotal-life-podcast-episode-1-our-unique-morning-culture-at-pivotal-labs]]> <[[https://youtu.be/60QbSXBC8zY]]> How Code Was Meant to be Written To keep up with disruptive technologies in the industry, NBCUniversal had to make some changes. DIrector of Engineering Amar Sharma explains how they changed their software approach with Pivotal Labs. Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/60QbSXBC8zY]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/09-dont-let-your-data-science-models-die-a-lonely-powerpoint-death]]> Donâ€™t Let Your Data Science Models Die a Lonely PowerPoint Death In this episode of Pivotal Insights, host Jeff Kelly talks to Kaushik Das about the importance of operationalizing data science models, why so many enterprises struggle to do so, and how a change of mindset is the key to success. Listen to the Episode <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/09-dont-let-your-data-science-models-die-a-lonely-powerpoint-death]]> Upcoming Events 11/18 Cloud Native Roadshow, Denver <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/denver]]>

11/29 Troubleshooting App Health and Performance with PCF Metrics 1.2, Online <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/troubleshooting-with-pcf-metrics-10am]]>
12/6 Future of Data Roadshow, Boston <[[http://hortonworks.com/roadshow/?utm_campaign=roadshow2016-boston]]>
